bike.description: D6 high modulus carbon, integrated head tube w/ 1 1/2" lower, internal cable routing, oversized PIIS BB-86 shell, double water bottle mounts
sizes: S (47cm), S/M (50cm), M (53cm), M/L (55cm),  L (58cm), XL (61cm)

components.description: D6 high modulus carbon thin seat stays, oversized ETC chainstay, forged alloy dropout w/ replaceable hanger
FC-330 carbon monocoque w/ tapered carbon steerer & carbon dropout
Shimano Ultegra STI shifter/brake, 20-speed, Flight Deck compatible
Oval 330 aero alloy, 30mm rims, DT Swiss Champion spokes 20/24H, precision ground hubs
Oval 500 forged alloy dual pivot w/ cartridge pads
Oval 1 1/8"U - 1 1/2"L integrated w/ alloy top cover
Selle Italia X1 w/ FeC alloy rails
